Summary: Orange yellow orb floating in same spot.
trends: There has been one other sighting in Delran
There were no other sightings in Delran on or around January 10th 2009
divs: sighting detailscame out of my house which faces southwest. observed a bright orange\yellow sort of pulsating orb. thought it was the usual philly air traffic but this light bobed around like a balloon in the same general spot. did not move like a stationary airplane. first thing that came to mind was the skeptics good old chinese lantern except the orange glow was not inside something like that. there was a light snow\freezing rain and the visibility was about 9 miles which put it in the direction of palmyran, pennsauken and cinnaminson, nj and philadelphia. the airport is about 28 miles from where i am at and i could not observe any other air traffic like i usually do. it was in the direction of the landing pattern but about 10 miles or less closer to my house (used visibility of 9 miles) the flight pattern is further than that for the air traffic into philly. i took out binoculars and the ufo\orb was clear in them. after a couple of minutes it got smaller and disappeared. in my opinion this was an unidentified object. i look up into the skies every day and night to train my eyes and look for abnormalities, so i am confident this was something out of the ordinary.
